summary: Creates a new circular mailing order
description: Inserts a new circular mailing order entry (e.g. basic welcome email order) for with given data.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the circular mailing template id.

parameters.name: circular_mailing_order
parameters.description: Properties of the new circular mailing order.

send_after.description: The time in seconds order deferred by.

user_ids.description: Array containing identifiers of platform users affected by the order.

owner_id.description: Identifier of the owner of the order.

422.description: The supplied circular mailing order parameters are invalid, the action is rolled back. *Refer to the body of the response.*
